class core.generator.Generator(*, provider: str | None = None, model_client: ~core.api_client.APIClient, model_kwargs: ~typing.Dict | None = {}, prompt: ~core.prompt_builder.Prompt = Prompt(   template:    <<SYS>>{# task desc #}   {% if task_desc_str %}   {{task_desc_str}}   {% endif %}   {# tools #}   {% if tools_str %}   {{tools_str}}   {% endif %}   {# example #}   {% if example_str %}   {{example_str}}   {% endif %}<</SYS>>   ---------------------   User query: {{query_str}}   {#contex#}   {% if context_str %}   Context: {{context_str}}   {% endif %}   {# chat history #}   {% if chat_history_str %}   {{chat_history_str}}   {% endif %}   {# steps #}   {% if steps_str %}   {{steps_str}}   {% endif %}   {# assistant response #}   You:    ), preset_prompt_kwargs: ~typing.Dict | None = None, output_processors: ~core.component.Component | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

update_default_model_kwargs(**model_kwargs) → Dict[source]ÔÉÅ

The model configuration exclude the input itself. Combine the default model, model_kwargs with the passed model_kwargs. Example: model_kwargs = {‚Äútemperature‚Äù: 0.5, ‚Äúmodel‚Äù: ‚Äúgpt-3.5-turbo‚Äù} self.model_kwargs = {‚Äúmodel‚Äù: ‚Äúgpt-3.5‚Äù} combine_kwargs(model_kwargs) => {‚Äútemperature‚Äù: 0.5, ‚Äúmodel‚Äù: ‚Äúgpt-3.5-turbo‚Äù}
